title: Is She An A*Hole For Giving Her Mom These Traveling Restrictions?
description:
Her mother is an extreme hoarder so traveling with her is always a struggle. She overpacks to the extent that it gives her anxiety. So she's given her mother limitations on what she can bring to visit her. Does this make her an a*hole or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
